title: Create FO-03 checkpoint component with multiple rounds
description:
Create checkpoint screens for after 10 affirmations and subsequent batches.

File to create:
- app/fo-03/components/step-checkpoint.tsx

Step 8 - After 10 affirmations:
- Headline: Perfect, {name}!
- Text: The ones you liked are now on your personal affirmation list. Let us add more, so you have a full personal list that fits you.
- CTAs: Continue (more swiping) / 'I am good with the affirmations I chose' (proceed to post-swipe)

Step 9 - After subsequent batches:
- Headline: Great job, {name}!
- Text: Your list is getting stronger and more personal. Would you like to add a few more affirmations?
- CTAs: Yes, please (more swiping) / No, continue (proceed to post-swipe)

Transition to post-swipe:
- Text: Perfect, {name}! You now have a strong list of personal affirmations. Next, let us make them feel even more you with a beautiful background.
- CTA: Continue
acceptance_criteria: npm run build succeeds; grep -l 'Perfect' app/fo-03/components/step-checkpoint.tsx returns the file
